attributes.action: Lift restrictions on Ukrainians entering the UK for refuge.
attributes.additional_details: Aside from the obvious moral code that we have instilled in us, as human beings, it is incredibly important to stand by Ukraine now more than ever. This is a country just like ours who have gone from going to work and meeting friends, to fleeing their country - their homes. Ripped from their sons, fathers, brothers, husbands as Ukraine have now stopped all 18-60 year old males from leaving the country to help fight for their freedom and basic human rights. Standing by is unforgivable.
attributes.background: Follow in the footsteps of Ireland and lift all restrictions on Ukrainians coming to the UK for refuge, organising shelter and safety for those who have fled war. There are currently hundreds of thousands of empty housing and we have the capability to help. Standing by is cowardly.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Grant Ukrainian citizens fleeing the war full rights to live and work in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609434

Grant Ukrainians, who have over-stayed their visas, leave to remain: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609716

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431

Commit to providing refuge for at least 100,000 Ukrainian women & children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609565
